name: Emerald Dragon Wyrmling
movement: 30 ft. walking, 15 ft. burrowing, 50 ft. flying
description: Emerald Dragon Wyrmling is a medium-sized dragon known for its cunning and psionic abilities, featuring a sleek body and vibrant green scales.
memorable: Able to psionically observe from 100 miles away and unleash a Maddening Breath attack.
goals: To manipulate and control its surroundings, utilizing its cunning and psionic abilities.
relations: Related to other dragon kinds, often encountered with older emerald dragons.
environment: Can be found in lush, green environments that provide cover for ambush.
strengths: Resistant to psychic and thunder damage, immune to fatigue.
weaknesses: Constitution is slightly lower, making it less resilient in extended battles.
attacks: Bites with sharp teeth for piercing damage and unleashes a thunderous cone attack.
most_powerful_ability: Far Thoughts allows for psionic observation over an impressive range.
senses: Possesses keen senses with an ability to observe psionic activities within 100 miles.
skills: Excels in deception and stealth with a +4 bonus in both skills.
additional_information: Has a tactical intelligence score of 14, enabling complex strategies.
Uses flying speed to maneuver effectively in combat.
Shifts between physical combat and psionic abilities.
Emphasizes chaos in battles with area attacks.

dragon with thunder breath and psionic powers
